*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=47329b7c166c&repo=net ***

go.net/ipv4: make supportsNewIPInput const

R=dave
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6822083

Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

LGTM. Nice.

On Tue, Nov 6, 2012 at 10:08 PM,  <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:
> Reviewers: dfc,
>
> Message:
> Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.net
>
>
> Description:
> go.net/ipv4: make supportsNewIPInput const
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6822083/
>
> Affected files:
>   M ipv4/header.go
>
>
> Index: ipv4/header.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/ipv4/header.go
> +++ b/ipv4/header.go
> @@ -120,7 +120,7 @@
>
>  // Please refer to the online manual; IP(4) on Darwin, FreeBSD and
>  // OpenBSD.  IP(7) on Linux.
> -var supportsNewIPInput = runtime.GOOS == "linux" || runtime.GOOS ==
> "openbsd"
> +const supportsNewIPInput = runtime.GOOS == "linux" || runtime.GOOS ==
> "openbsd"
>
>  // Marshal returns the binary encoding of the IPv4 header h.
>  func (h *Header) Marshal() ([]byte, error) {
>
>

subject: code review 6822083: go.net/ipv4: make supportsNewIPInput const
